Window.BasicDrawDevice

　The Window.BasicDrawDevice class is a DrawDevice that registers this instance with Window.drawDevice and provides standard drawing functions.

メンバ

コンストラクタ
BasicDrawDevice
メソッド
recreate ( Internal device regeneration )
プロパティ
interface ( Get interface object )
イベント
onDisplayRotate ( When the screen is rotated (1.1.0 or later) )
